title: Secret Plunge
description:
What happens when an Olympic athlete and a young divorcée start their new year together?

One hot night, lots of laughter, and a little surprise.
One night. That’s all I wanted. To start the new year on a good note and forget about the chaos last year brought.Enter Ryan, with his dark eyes, panty-melting smile, and a sinful body. He’s the perfect distraction.When I’m left with more than just the spell-binding memories of our night together, I’m positively freaking out.Things get even more complicated when I find out how our lives are already intertwined. Will I be able to keep our connection a secret while we get to know each other, or will this whole mess blow up in my face?
author: Jasmin Miller
